Mon, 16 Jul 2012 14:42:04 +0000 http://wordpress.org/?v=2.5.1 en Livrada: Customized e-book gift cards http://workitmom.com/bloggers/affordableluxuries/2012/07/16/livrada-customized-e-book-gift-cards/ http://workitmom.com/bloggers/affordableluxuries/2012/07/16/livrada-customized-e-book-gift-cards/#comments Mon, 16 Jul 2012 14:42:04 +0000 Angella http://workitmom.com/bloggers/affordableluxuries/?p=1755 A friend emailed me about Livrada gift cards. They are launching 6 New York Times best selling titles (including 50 Shades of Grey) in ALL Target stores this summer. Livrada gift cards are a more personal gift for any e-reader in your life. They are the first ones to make it possible to give an ebook as a gift, in a personal and tangible way. No more gift via email or generic gift cards. Their gift cards are replicas of the actual book cover and work on all Kindle and Nook devices.

You likely already know that Bluefly is your destination for discounted designer duds and accessories, but every now and then they put on a sale blowout that puts even their regularly discounted prices to shame. Now is one of those times—the entire site is on sale, with items up to 75% off!

It’s the perfect opportunity to dress like you spent a million bucks, but without breaking the bank.

Spend $75+ and your shipping is free, too. This is my kind of great deal.

The annual summer dilemma of making more space in the garage is about to be solved—right now you can get a 2-pack of RAD bicycle hoists from Buy.com for just $18 shipped, and your bikes will be put away without taking up any precious floor space.

For comparison: Amazon currently has the same bundle for $24.95, so this is about a 30% savings as well as free shipping (tricksy Amazon kept it under $25 so that you’d have to have Prime for the free shipping).

Reviews are plentiful and largely positive, so if bikes are taking over your space, this is a great deal.
